original_text: I asked Titus to come and visit you, and I sent another Christian friend with him. But Titus certainly did not deceive you to get anything from you. Both he and I have always been completely honest with you. We both think in the same way.
korean_text: 내가 디도를 권하고 함께 한 형제를 보내었으니 디도가 너희의 이득을 취하더냐 우리가 동일한 성령으로 행하지 아니하더냐 동일한 보조로 하지 아니하더냐

sentences.original_text: I asked Titus to come and visit you
and I sent another Christian friend with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그와 함께 다른 그리스도인 친구를 보냈다

sentences.original_text: But Titus certainly did not deceive you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 디도는 결코 너희를 속이지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Both he and I have always been completely honest with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 나는 항상 너희에게 완전히 정직했다

sentences.original_text: We both think in the same way
